I got 1 problem though:
I can play DC 1 just fine, but when I try to play DC 2, it will boot, but then it comes up with a screen saying: Reading Memory Card (PS2) and it just stays like that...
Tried booting without the mc and then insert it when this screen comes up, or when the screen comes up removing te mc and putting it in again (tried both slots) but all still gives the same screen...
Besides this game, I never had this problem before and as I stated I can play DC 1 just fine...
I am using USBExtreme to play.

Any1 know how to solve this?
